messages.content: What is the purpose of the Bing Image Grabber node in ConCarneNode?
The Bing Image Grabber node in ConCarneNode collects a random image via Bing Image Search using an input search term.
What happens when the Bing Image Grabber node collects multiple images?
When the Bing Image Grabber node collects multiple images, it crops and resizes them to 512x512 for batching.
How can the Bing Image Grabber node be used to provide a reference for img2img?
The Bing Image Grabber node can be used to grab an image from Bing based on a search term, which can then be used as a reference for img2img in ComfyUI.
How can the Bing Image Grabber node be used to embed IPAdapter on the fly?

The Bing Image Grabber node can be used to collect multiple images based on a search term like 'woman drinking orange juice', which can then be used to embed IPAdapter on the fly with a prompt like 'selena gomez'.
How can the Bing Image Grabber node be used for facial embedding?

The Bing Image Grabber node can be used to collect multiple images of a person, like 'PewDiePie', which can then be cropped to the face and used for facial embedding with a prompt like 'man in armor'.
What is the purpose of the Zephyr node in ConCarneNode?
The Zephyr node in ConCarneNode implements the huggingface transformer of stability.ai's Zephyr 3B chat transformer to infer text based on a prompt, which is useful for creating a list of prompts.
Which chat transformer does the Zephyr node in ConCarneNode use?
The Zephyr node in ConCarneNode uses stability.ai's Zephyr 3B chat transformer.
